tit.e: Daikinban (the imperial standard [flag] for the ceremony of enthronement)
tit.cmt: カッコ部分を補いました。
tit.e: Daikinban (the imperial standard [flag] for the ceremony of enthronement)

sen.j: 大錦旛（だいきんばん）は、即位の礼の日、紫宸殿前の庭に立てられる錦旛のひとつである。
sen.e: Daikinban is one of the imperial standard made of gold brocade erected at Sokui no rei (ceremony of enthronement) in a garden in front of Shishinden (hall for state ceremonies).
The Daikinban is made of gold brocade and one of the imperial standards (flags) erected at Sokui no rei (ceremony of enthronement) in the garden in front of Shishinden (hall for state ceremonies).
sen.cmt: the を補いました。standard→standards (flags),a→the と修正しました。
sen.e: The Daikinban is made of gold brocade and one of the imperial standards (flags) erected at Sokui no rei (ceremony of enthronement) in the garden in front of Shishinden (hall for state ceremonies).

sen.j: 頭八咫烏形大錦旛と、霊鵄形大錦旛との2種がある。
sen.e: There are two standard types, one is printed Yatagarasu (three-legged crow inhabiting the sun in Chinese mythology) and the other one is printed Reisi (kite).
There are two types for this standard (flag), one is patterned Yatagarasu (three-legged crow inhabiting the sun in Chinese mythology), and the other one is patterned Reisi (kite).
sen.cmt: two standard types→two types for this standard (flag),printed→patterned と修正しました。カンマを補いました。
sen.e: There are two types for this standard (flag), one is patterned Yatagarasu (three-legged crow inhabiting the sun in Chinese mythology), and the other one is patterned Reisi (kite).

sen.j: 前者は、五彩瑞雲の錦に頭八咫烏の形を黒く繍にし、戟竿に掛け、日像纛旛の南に立てる。
sen.e: The former is printed Yatagarasu on five colored auspicious clouds brocade, hung on a pole and put up on the south side of Nissho toban (日像纛旛) (symbol of sun printed on the standard).
The former is embroidered Yatagarasu on five colored auspicious clouds brocade, hung on a pole and put up on the south side of Nissho toban (the flag with golden sun embroidered).
sen.cmt: printed→embroidered,「日像纛旛」の部分を修正しました。参照：http://www.kunaicho.go.jp/20years/kyotogosho/kyotogosho-tenji.html
sen.e: The former is embroidered Yatagarasu on five colored auspicious clouds brocade, hung on a pole and put up on the south side of Nissho toban (the flag with golden sun embroidered).

sen.j: 後者は、五彩瑞雲の錦に金色の霊鵄を繍にし、戟竿に掛け、月像纛旛の南に立てる。
sen.e: The latter is printed gold Reisi on five colored auspicious clouds brocade, hung on a pole and put up on the south side of Gessho toban (月像纛旛) (symbol of moon printed on the standard).
The latter is embroidered gold Reisi on five colored auspicious clouds brocade, hung on a pole and put up on the south side of Gessho toban (the flag with silver moon embroidered).
sen.cmt: printed→embroidered, 「月像纛旛」の部分を修正しました。参照：http://www.kunaicho.go.jp/20years/kyotogosho/kyotogosho-tenji.html
sen.e: The latter is embroidered gold Reisi on five colored auspicious clouds brocade, hung on a pole and put up on the south side of Gessho toban (the flag with silver moon embroidered).
